description.0: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.

0.0: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing <cryo>160%</cryo> ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.
